events.name: gameOver
events.initialValue: Silahkan tutup soal game ini dan kembali ke game utama

parameters.message: tokenat(tokenat(puzzleStart, loopindex("k"), "|"), 0, ",") & " " & tokenat(tokenat(puzzleStart, loopindex("k"), "|"), 1, ",") & " " & tokenat(tokenat(puzzleStart, loopindex("k"), "|"), 2, ",")

"periksa x "&int(tokenat(tokenat(solusi, loopindex("i"), "|"), 1, ","))&" y "&int(tokenat(tokenat(solusi, loopindex("i"), "|"), 0, ","))&" nilai "&int(tokenat(tokenat(solusi, loopindex("i"), "|"), 2, ","))
